entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tracadie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 3.6°C
Wind: SSE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or periods of drizzle ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
